text:
Hi Raja, check out the boilerplate theme. In some of the section files you can see some examples of how to use context.

Look at the hero-banner.html for example: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/sections/hero-banner.html>

And compare it with the landing-page.html template: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/templates/landing-page.html>

Comparing these two files helps to illustrate that you could use one section in many templates, and have each template specify different contextual content to display by default.
